channel.title: Referer problems
channel.description:
Error: You don't appear to be sending an HTTP Referer, possibly due to a bad browser, or a browser extension you have installed. However, you must send a valid Referer in order to agree to these terms and use this site. If you have problems with this, try it once more, then email admin@moparisthebest.com with the subject 'referer problems'.
I clicked a bookmark and get this. What.

item.title: Referer problems
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

It always work, but I always get the error.

Read full topic

item.title: Referer problems
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

Also, there should be a mobile version of the Terms of Service. With mobile advertisements.

Read full topic

item.title: Referer problems
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:5, topic:386735”][quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=482504.msg3533524#msg3533524 date=1300388510]
I get this all the time on the base browser on my droid x so I never some to this site on my phone.
[/quote]

It doesn’t work if you click ‘I agree’? Or do you just not try. It works fine from my Droid.[/quote]

I click agree then it goes back to the same page. I had to download a different browser like firefox or xscope to get onto the site so its not biggie hold on tho I will try again.

EDIT: HMMM it works now but about 2 months ago I would click agree and it would redirect to that same page so I guess theres no problem my bad.

Read full topic
